comments:

Lance

What is org.antlr.eclipse? This is not part of the platform. The UI is trying 
to set the selection on a 3rd party menu that is part of the antlr plugin. You 
should notify the providers of that plugin of the problem.

Thanks for the response. org.antlr.eclipse is a plugin for helping with ANTLR
grammar files.

I've notified the plug-in authors of the problem.

Regards,

Lance
